Journal.Chat: View the Cauldron of Plentiful Resources readme here:
Journal.Welcome:
Thank you for using this module! If you find any bugs or please either make a Github issue or bug report on our Discord. Do not pester tposney, Zhell, or any other module authors with bugs or issues related to this module.

Extended information on the module including a current FAQ, Getting Started, and feature information is available on the Cauldron of Plentiful Resources Wiki. The wiki provides explanations, pictures, and examples that can answer most questions about the module.

Requirements.MissingClass: The configured class/subclass {classIdentifier} does not exist on this actor!
Requirements.ScaleAdded: The scale {scaleIdentifier} has been added to the class {classIdentifier}!

activityCSSTweak.Hint: When enabled, activities will have all their information one tab. Reload required after disabling.
activityCSSTweak.Name: Activities CSS Tweak

addActions.Hint: Добавляет общие действия, когда токен указанного типа устанавливается на сцену.
addActions.Name: Добавлять действия токенам

addCompendiumButton.Hint: When enabled, a button will be added to compendium headers to copy the id.
addCompendiumButton.Name: Compendium ID Button

additionalCompendiums.Hint: Выберите дополнительные библиотеки, которые будут использоваться medkit для поиска автоматизаций.
additionalCompendiums.Name: Дополнительные библиотеки

applyConditionChanges.Hint: When enabled, conditions will automatically have Midi-QOL effects applied to them.
applyConditionChanges.Name: Apply Midi-QOL Condition Effects

automatedAnimationSounds.Hint: Предметы с отключенным звуком в Automated Animations все равно будут проигрывать звук.
automatedAnimationSounds.Name: Automated Animations: Проигрывать звуки

backupCompendium.Hint: Выберите библиотеку, в которой будут храниться резервные копии актёров.
backupCompendium.Name: Библиотека для резервных копий актеров

backupFrequency.Hint: Как часто должна создаваться резервная копия актера.
backupFrequency.Name: Частота резервных копий

backupMake.Hint: Make a backup right now using the specified compendium.
backupMake.Name: Make A Backup

backupRetention.Hint: How long backup characters are kept.
backupRetention.Name: Backup Retention

backupTime.Hint: Last time a backup was made (in milliseconds). Automatically set.
backupTime.Name: Last Backup Time

backups.Hint: Автоматически создает резервные копии персонажей игроков в указанной библиотеке.
backups.Name: Автоматически сохранять персонажей игркоков

bg3WeaponActionConfig.Hint: Configure the Baldur's Gate 3 weapon actions.
bg3WeaponActionConfig.Name: Configure Baldur's Gate 3 Weapon Actions

bg3WeaponActionUses.Hint: Maximum uses per a short rest the weapon action may be used.
bg3WeaponActionUses.Name: Baldur's Gate 3 Weapon Action Uses

bg3WeaponActionsEnabled.Hint: When enabled, Baldur's Gate 3 style weapon actions will be added to actors when weapons are equipped.
bg3WeaponActionsEnabled.Name: Baldur's Gate 3 Weapon Actions

checkForUpdates.Hint: Модуль будет проверять наличие обновлений один раз в день, когда Ведущий заходит в мир.
checkForUpdates.Name: Проверять обновления

classSpellList.Hint: Journal with all class spell lists configured.
classSpellList.Name: Class Spell List Journal

cleave.Hint: Enables cleave mechanic from the Dungeon Master's Guide
cleave.Name: DMG Cleave

colorizeAutomatedAnimations.Hint: When enabled, the Automated Animations titlebar icon will be recolored based on the configuration status.
colorizeAutomatedAnimations.Name: Automated Animations: Colorize Titlebar Icon

colorizeDAE.Hint: When enabled, the DAE titlebar icon will be recolored if an effect is on the item.
colorizeDAE.Name: Dynamic Active Effects: Colorize Titlebar Icon

conditionResistanceAndVulnerability.Hint: Enables condition resistance and vulnerability automation.
conditionResistanceAndVulnerability.Name: Condition Resistance and Vulnerability

criticalFumbleMode.Hint: When enabled, critical or fumble attack rolls will also roll an item from the selected compendiums.
criticalFumbleMode.Name: Critical And Fumble Mode

customChatMessage.Hint: Gives a dark theme to the chat messages.
customChatMessage.Name: Chat Message Dark Mode

customSidebar.Hint: CSS tweaks to the sidebar including chat background and scrollbar flipping and other minor changes.
customSidebar.Name: Custom Sidebar

diceSoNice.Hint: When enabled, Dice So Nice damage roll animations will be delayed until after all damage roll macros are complete.
diceSoNice.Name: Dice So Nice: Damage Rolls

disableModulesWarning.Hint: When enabled, CPR will not check for known issues with having certain modules enabled and warn you about them.
disableModulesWarning.Name: Other Module Check

disableNonConditionStatusEffects.Hint: When enabled, all core non-condition status effects will be removed.
disableNonConditionStatusEffects.Name: Disable Non-Condition Status Effects

disableSettingsWarning.Hint: When enabled, CPR will not check some other module settings for issues and warn you about them.
disableSettingsWarning.Name: Other Module Settings Check

disableSpecialEffects.Hint: When enabled, the blinded and invisible conditions don't apply visual effects.
disableSpecialEffects.Name: Disable Special Effects

displayNestedConditions.Hint: When enabled, nested condition effects will be visible. For example: Paralyzed will also visibly add Incapacitated.
displayNestedConditions.Name: Display Nested Conditions

effectDescriptionNPC.Hint: When enabled, the Automatic Effect Description setting will not apply for NPC created effects.
effectDescriptionNPC.Name: Hide NPC Effect Descriptions

effectDescriptions.Hint: When enabled, effects without descriptions will automatically be filled in from the origin item.
effectDescriptions.Name: Automatic Effect Descriptions

effectInterface.Hint: Adds a sidebar tab for Active Effects. Reload required after enabling.
effectInterface.Name: Enable Effect Interface

enableAnimations.Hint: When enabled, certain automations will have custom animations. Requires Sequencer and JB2A.
enableAnimations.Name: Enable CPR Animations

enableEmbeddedMacrosEditing.Hint: When enabled, the embedded macros editor will be available. (Not ready for use!)
enableEmbeddedMacrosEditing.Name: Enable Embedded Macros Editing

epicRolls.Hint: When enabled, certain macros will use Epic Rolls when possible.
epicRolls.Name: Epic Rolls: Enabled

explodingHeals.Hint: When enabled, all healing roll formulas will automatically be adjusted to explode.
explodingHeals.Name: Exploding Heals

exportForSharing.Hint: When enabled, an alternative export button will be added to the item and actor context menu to export an item with descriptions removed. Reload required after enabling.
exportForSharing.Name: Export For Sharing

firearmSupport.Hint: When enabled, Firearms automation will be available (From Critical Role's Gunslinger class).
firearmSupport.Name: Firearm Support

gambitPremades.Hint: Which compendiums should be included in the additional compendium search for Gambit's Premades.
gambitPremades.Name: Gambit's Premades: Options

gmID.Hint: The Gamemaster ID used for sockets. Automatically set.
gmID.Name: Gamemaster User ID

groupSummonsWithOwner.Hint: When enabled, summons created via the CPR API will be grouped together in the combat tracker if their initative is the same.
groupSummonsWithOwner.Name: Group Summons With Owner

hiddenCompendiumFolders.Hint: Selected compendium folders will be hidden.
hiddenCompendiumFolders.Name: Hidden Compendium Folders

hideNames.Hint: Should enemy names be hidden in dialogs.
hideNames.Name: Hide Names

itemCompendium.Hint: Item compendium used for certain automations. Ideally should point to your D&D Beyond item compendium.
itemCompendium.Name: Item Compendium

itemContext.Hint: When enabled, the item context menu will have additional options (Send, Condense, and Split).
itemContext.Name: Additional Item Context Options

lastUpdateCheck.Hint: When was the last update check run (in milliseconds). Automatically set.
lastUpdateCheck.Name: Last Update Check

legendaryActionsPrompt.Hint: Tracks and prompts for unused legendary actions when combat moves forward.
legendaryActionsPrompt.Name: Legendary Actions Prompt

macroCompendium.Hint: Macro compendium that is used to overwrite or add additional macros to the CPR API. Please see documentation on how to use this. (WIP)
macroCompendium.Name: Macro Compendium

manualRollsEnabled.Hint: Enable CPR's Roll Resolver for Unfulfilled Rolls.
manualRollsEnabled.Name: Manual Rolls

manualRollsGMFulfils.Hint: When enabled the Gamemaster fulfils all rolls.
manualRollsGMFulfils.Name: Gamemaster Fulfils Rolls

manualRollsInclusion.Hint: What actor's rolls should be prompted for.
manualRollsInclusion.Name: Manual Rolls Inclusion

manualRollsInputDiceOnly.Hint: Input dice results only, excluding modifiers.
manualRollsInputDiceOnly.Name: Input Dice Only

manualRollsPromptNoData.Hint: Prompt for rolls with no data, likely used in macros.
manualRollsPromptNoData.Name: Prompt on No Data

manualRollsPromptOnMiss.Hint: Prompt for damage rolls even for missed attacks.
manualRollsPromptOnMiss.Name: Prompt on Miss

manualRollsUsers.Hint: Configure which users use Manual Rolls.
manualRollsUsers.Name: Manual Rolls Users

matchSummonElevation.Hint: If enabled, CPR-summoned tokens will be created with the same elevation as the summoner token.
matchSummonElevation.Name: Summons Match Summoner's Elevation

miscPremades.Hint: Which compendiums should be included in the additional compendium search for Midi Item Showcase - Community.
miscPremades.Name: Midi Item Showcase: Options

monsterCompendium.Hint: Monster compendium used for certain automations. Ideally should point to your D&D Beyond monster compendium.
monsterCompendium.Name: Monster Compendium

movementPerformance.Hint:
Accuracy mode for movement events. Higher accuracy modes will have a greater performance impact, especially on less powerful hardware.
• Ultra: Full accuracy.
• High: Ignores cover calculation when getting distance.
• Medium: As high, and waypoint movement is ignored, except for the final segment.
• Low: As Medium, and walls are ignored in distance calculations.
movementPerformance.Name: Movement Event Accuracy

movementPerformanceDisable.Hint: Disables the warning notification that appears when movement event processing is taking a long time.
movementPerformanceDisable.Name: Disable Movement Performance Warning

permissionsAutomateItem.Hint: Lowest user ranking that can select and apply different automations in the Medkit.
permissionsAutomateItem.Name: Medkit Apply Automation Permissions

permissionsConfigureHomebrew.Hint: Lowest user ranking that can configure homebrew customizations in the Medkit.
permissionsConfigureHomebrew.Name: Medkit Configure Homebrew Permissions

permissionsConfigureItem.Hint: Lowest user ranking that can configure automations in the Medkit.
permissionsConfigureItem.Name: Medkit Configuration Permissions

permissionsUpdateItem.Hint: Lowest user ranking that can update the currently selected automation in the Medkit.
permissionsUpdateItem.Name: Medkit Update Automation Permissions

playerSelectsConjures.Hint: When casting "Conjure X" spells, the player (not the GM) can select which creatures to conjure.
playerSelectsConjures.Name: Player Selects Conjures

quickConditions.Hint: Adds a button to the Use Condition and Active Effect Condition fields on the midi tab on activities which opens a quick condition interface.
quickConditions.Name: Quick Conditions

replaceStatusEffectIcons.Hint: When enabled, status icons will be replaced.
replaceStatusEffectIcons.Name: Replace Status Icons

seenTour.Hint: Has the tour prompt been viewed? Automatically set.
seenTour.Name: Tour Prompt

selectTool.Hint: When enabled, the select tool is available in more places. Reload required after enabling.
selectTool.Name: Select Tool Everywhere

spellCompendium.Hint: Spell compendium used for certain automations. Ideally should point to your D&D Beyond spell compendium.
spellCompendium.Name: Spell Compendium

spotlightOmnisearchSummons.Hint: When enabled, you can use Spotlight Omnisearch to summon creatures from your monster compendium. Reload required after enabling.
spotlightOmnisearchSummons.Name: Spotlight Omnisearch: Summons

syncActorSizeToTokens.Hint: When enabled, effects that change an actors size will also change the token size on the canvas.
syncActorSizeToTokens.Name: Sync Actor and Token Size

temporaryEffectHud.Hint: Adds Temporary effects to the status effect token HUD.
temporaryEffectHud.Name: Temporary Effects HUD

thirdParty.Hint: Medkit будет включать в себя и Homebrew автоматизации.
thirdParty.Name: Сторонние материалы

updateCompanionInitiative.Hint: Автоматически выставляет инициативу спутника сразу после того, как игрок совершает бросок инициативы.
updateCompanionInitiative.Name: Обновлять инициативу спутников

updateSummonInitiative.Hint: Автоматически выставляет инициативу призывных существ сразу после того, как игрок совершает бросок инициативы.
updateSummonInitiative.Name: Обновлять инициативу призывных существ

useLocalCompendiums.Hint: Использовать библиотеки из мира, а не из модуля, для просмотра предметов.
useLocalCompendiums.Name: Использовать библиотеки мира

vaeButtons.Hint: When enabled, certain macros will add buttons to the VAE interface.
vaeButtons.Name: Visual Active Effects: Buttons

weaponMastery.Hint: Включить автоматизацию оружейного мастерства из Книги игрока 2024.
weaponMastery.Name: Автоматизация оружейного мастерства

SpotlightOmnisearch.Actor: Selected token is not associated with any actor!
SpotlightOmnisearch.Description: Summon a {name} using Cauldron of Plentiful Resources.
SpotlightOmnisearch.Token: Please selected a token before using this feature!

Summons.DismissHP: Summon reached 0 hitpoints! Should they be dismissed?
Summons.NoMatching: No matching actors found in specified compendium!

0.Content: This tour will guide you through using some of the core features of using Cauldron of Plentiful Resources.
0.Title: Welcome!

1.Content: All automations available in this module are stored here.
1.Title: Compendiums

2.Content: As an example, the spell "Fire Shield" is stored in the "CPR Spells" compendium. You can drag the spell from this compendium onto your actor to use it.
2.Title: Compendiums

3.Content: Alternatively, you can press the Medkit icon on an item. This will open up the Medkit application, which can be used to automatically replace an item with it's automation.
3.Title: Item Medkit

4.Content:
The medkit displays the status of the item here.
Red: Out of date.
Yellow: An automation is available
Green: The item is up to date.
Blue: The item is up to date and has configuration options.
4.Title: Item Status

5.Content: Here you can select which automation to apply if multiple sources of automation are available.
5.Title: Available Automations

6.Content: If an item has configuration options, you may set them in the configuration tab.
6.Title: Item Configuration

7.Content: The Medkit icon on an actor is a bulk updater. You can update all items on an actor here.
7.Title: Actor Medkit

8.Content: Some automations require making temporary items on an actor sheet. This module uses journal pages (that you need to fill out on your own) to add descriptions to them.
8.Title: Description Journal

9.Content:
For example, the spell "Dragon's Breath" will make a temporary feature called "Dragon Breath" on the target actor.
Filling in this journal page will populate the description when it's created.
9.Title: Description Journal

10.Content: This module has many settings. Please make sure to carefully go through them all and only enable the ones you need.
10.Title: Module Settings

11.Content: Further assistance may be found in the help category.
11.Title: Help

Tour.Chat: View a guided tour of Cauldron of Plentiful Resources here:
Tour.Description: Take a tour of Cauldron of Plentiful Resources.
Tour.Hint: Start a guided tour of Cauldron of Plentiful Resources.
Tour.Title: Cauldron of Plentiful Resources Tour

flags.chris-premades.senses.magicalDarkn.description: Distance actor can see through magical darkness. Only affects attack adv/dis with CPR automations which create magical darkness.
flags.chris-premades.senses.magicalDarkn.name: Magical Darkness Sense Range

flags.chris-premades.turnResistance.description: Resistance to Turn Undead, rolls at advantage.
flags.chris-premades.turnResistance.name: Turn Resistance
